summary: Fix ProxySQL query rules reconciliation: use remote admin user (radmin) and make non-fatal to prevent unrelated deploy failures

changes.description: ProxySQL query rules reconciliation now uses the remote admin user (radmin) instead of the localhost-only admin user, fixing 'proxysql admin not ready' failures that were the root cause of many deploy failures.
ProxySQL query rules reconciliation failure is now non-fatal â€” logs a warning and continues the deploy instead of failing it. The rules are already baked into the ProxySQL config template.
